'''Sharktacular Surfari''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Splish-Splash Wavechaser" [[Mualani]] ({{Hydro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
* The first occurrence of this Wish Series ran alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Surf's Up]], a weapon tailored to Mualani's gameplay mechanics.
